title: The Book of Noise!
description: Let’s make a lot of noise!The hilarious book of noise is here, and it has children laughing and shouting everywhere. Have your kids follow along, and pretty soon everyone will be barking like a dog, quacking like a duck, patting their heads, and yelling like there is no tomorrow! Let it all out! Just don’t wake the neighbors!This book requires human interaction to produce sound.
author: Othen Donald Dale Cummings
